text: Now Naaman, captain of the host of the king of Syria, was a great man with his master, and honourable, because by him the LORD had given deliverance unto Syria: he was also a mighty man in valour, but he was a leper.5.1 with: Heb. before5.1 honourable: or, gracious: Heb. lifted up, or, accepted in countenance5.1 deliverance: or, victory
